text: {| |+SS Vaterland |} The Vaterland was ordered by the Hamburg-Amerika Line as the first of three planned liners for North Atlantic service. She had a length of and measured 41,000 gross tons She was launched in 1940, but she was laid up incomplete at Kuhwerder Hamburg. She was heavily damaged by Allied bombers on 25 July 1943. In 1948 it was decided that she was too damaged to be completed and her wreck was scrapped. ==References== Category:Ships of the Hamburg America Line Category:Maritime incidents in July 1943
title: SS Vaterland (1940)
